name: Elementus Journey-Help the guardian save your world
name_original: Elementus Journey-Help the guardian save your world
description:
Elementus is a Guardian in a magic world and he lives in peace and harmony. However, the peace is broken when alliens invade his home planet looking up for environmental resources and steals all elemental powers by turning into a normal resident. 

In addition to steal the environmental power, the enemy destroys the teleportation jewel breaking it into a lot of pieces that spreads out in the kingdom.
